title: Mr.Patrol
description:
The Mr.Patrol application allows you to monitor your cameras online. It is easily to use and designed to make your surveillance solution to be simplified. Users can access playback and directly save files to the phone to export to others. The application has different customized settings for every customer and allows users to remove and add features based on their needs.
Function
- Live Channels – 1 / 4 / 9 / 16 / 25 / 36 display mode
- Scroll Live View
- Gallery Mode – Users can save and store files directly into the phone and be able to export to others.
- Snapshot
- PTZ Control
- Device List Management – Add / Delete / Edit / Built in QR Code
- Instant P2P Connection
- Live View / Playback – Scroll View Compatible
- Add / Remove Settings and Features
